content.html: Cis has never been a slur you div, it’s just a term for non trans person of that gender. Personally I’d just call women “women” whether cis or trans, because they’re both women. #istandagainstjkrowling #transwomenarewomen #translivesmatter
content.value: Cis has never been a slur you div, it’s just a term for non trans person of that gender. Personally I’d just call women “women” whether cis or trans, because they’re both women. #istandagainstjkrowling #transwomenarewomen #translivesmatter
